abstract: University of Florida closes Zeta Beta Tau fraternity after members are accused of having made alcohol-fueled verbal assaults at group of disabled military veterans at a resort in Panama City Beach.
lead_paragraph: The University of Florida closed a fraternity Tuesday after allegations that its members hurled drunken insults and spat at a group of disabled military veterans at a Panama City Beach resort.

headline.main: Florida: University of Florida Fraternity Shut After Attacks on Veterans
headline.print_headline: Florida: Fraternity Shut After Attacks on Veterans

snippet: The University of Florida closed a fraternity Tuesday after allegations that its members hurled drunken insults and spat at a group of disabled military veterans at a Panama City Beach resort.
